channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report E-2024080769
item.description:
Report E-2024080769

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-04T09:14:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-26
  • City: COURTLAND
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately three (3) ounces of material released from one (1) metal can due to being crushed from shifting load during transit. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area and containerized the cleanup debris into one (1) 20-gallon poly drum along with impacted cardboard and the damaged metal can. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freighâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
